introduction.name: My name is Pedro Lucas.
introduction.text: I am a front-end developer and a UI/UX designer :)

skills.text: It was thanks to programming that I found myself again, and for this reason, I constantly seek to improve. I have an affinity for front-end development and a curiosity about everything that surrounds it.

texts.first: In September 2022, I started my journey in programming studies through online courses.
texts.second: In February 2023, I began studying Software Engineering at Cat√≥lica de SC - Joinville.
texts.third: In October 2023, I started working as an intern Vue.JS developer for the company Dinamio.

box-principal.title: I am human!
box-principal.text: In addition to my programming and design studies, I like to make the most of my free time by hanging out with friends, going to the gym, and reading good books. There's always something playing on my headphones. I'm a fan of samba, MPB and funk.
